data.title: SHE Community on LinkedIn: We are so proud and grateful that Gro Harlem Brundtland will be joining…
data.meta_description:
We are so proud and grateful that Gro Harlem Brundtland will be joining this year’s SHE Conference as a speaker 🌍

Gro Harlem Brundtland, is a globally… | 17 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
The Business Case for Social Sustainability 🌍 Did you miss the groundbreaking insights from SHE Conference 2024? No worries, we’ve got you covered! Dive into our key learnings and discover how the LLA Framework (Listen. Learn. Act.) is shaping the future of inclusive leadership and sustainable long-term growth. From AI workshops and diverse leadership panels to global collaboration on impact investing and health equity, our conference was a melting pot of innovation and actionable strategies. This isn’t just another event; it’s a movement towards creating environments where every voice is heard and valued. Ready to be part of this change? The SHE Conference 2025 is on the horizon, and it's your chance to join leaders and changemakers in driving forward social sustainability. Whether you’re a seasoned professional or just starting, this is the platform to amplify your impact. 🎟️ Get your tickets now! Don’t miss out on this unparalleled opportunity to network, learn, and lead. Visit sheconference.no to secure your spot and stay tuned for exciting updates! Let’s continue to listen, learn, and act together to build a more inclusive and sustainable future. Your voice matters. Be there to make it count. #SHEConference #SocialSustainability #ListenLearnAct

SHE 2024 Podcast 🎙️ Katherine Dudtschak, (she / her) ICD.D is a c-suite business leader, corporate board director, advisor, and community builder. She has held one of Canada’s most senior financial services executive roles, as CEO across 19 countries and recognized across Canada for her leadership and impact by many organizations. She is currently the President and CEO of HomeEquity Bank. Katherine affirmed her gender in 2019, coming out as Katherine in front of 80,000 colleagues, many employees of the division she was leading. Michelle Chinnappen and Katie have a warm and personal conversation, yet full of tangible business content. They tap into her perspective and knowledge on leadership and human capital, her new exciting CEO position and how inclusive leadership always starts with actually being inclusive from the top. Enjoy! ☀️ ⏯️ Listen now: https://lnkd.in/d-fdgmsg #SHEConference #SocialSustainability #ListenLearnAct #InclusiveLeadership #HumanCapital

Step into a world where inspiration meets innovation at the SHE Conference 🌟 Watch as our speakers, like Laura Penn, Ph.D. at SHE2024, share insights and experiences that redefine what it means to lead and inspire. The SHE Conference is where you and your company need to be! Learn more and secure your tickets for 2025 on sheconference.no 🔗 📸 JCP #SHEConference #SocialSustainability #ListenLearnAct #Inspiration #Leadership #Networking

Ordtilhandling's session and stand at the 2024 SHE Conference garnered significant interest and was a tremendous success! 🙌 We are excited to share more about our leadership program, SHE Leads powered by Ordtilhandling, designed for aspiring female leaders ready to elevate their careers. SHE Leads focuses on practical and demanding leadership development that truly works. With a program start in October 2024 in Oslo, spaces are filling up fast. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this transformative experience—register now while spots are still available! https://lnkd.in/dFh3iw6U 🔗 Secure your place and take the next step in your leadership journey with SHE Leads. Astrid Rønning Skaugseth, Stina Hofgaard Røsjø, Stian Karlsen, Hulda Haugen, Amanda Borg, Lene Beke #SocialSustainability #SHEConference #ListenLearnAct #LeadershipDevelopment

We are still filled with excitement and inspiration from the incredible learnings and connections made at SHE Conference 2024! This year’s conference truly empowered us to push for social sustainability and innovation in business and society. From thought-provoking sessions to meaningful networking, the experience was unforgettable. We’re already looking forward to SHE Conference 2025 on April 1st in NOVA Spektrum 🚀 Learn more and secure your ticket on sheconference.no 🔗 📸 JCP #SocialSustainability #SHEConference #ListenLearnAct #Leadership #ESG

We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to all of our partners, attendees, and followers for your incredible support and participation in this year's SHE Conference. Your dedication and enthusiasm made the event truly impactful. As we are now entering the summer holidays, we hope you all get the chance to unwind and spend quality time with your loved ones. Your hard work and commitment deserve a well-earned break ☀️ Read more about our plans ahead and next year's conference in our newsletter ⬇️ Astrid Rønning Skaugseth, Lene Beke, Amanda Borg, JCP

We are excited to announce that we will be co-hosting an event with EY for Oslo Innovation Week 🔊 Join us on September 24th at S7 from 15:00-16:30 to merge innovation with conscience! Discover how top Private Equity firms deploy ESG- and impact strategies to derive both financial and societal value. Do you want to learn more about the transformative potential of private capital and how to become attractive to investors? This event is tailored for those seeking to align their vision with purpose and who would like to be part of the change where impact enhances performance. 🔗 Sign-up here: https://lnkd.in/dF6T42g8 Speakers include: Jan Henry S. Fosse, Linn Anker-Sørensen, Astrid Rønning Skaugseth, and more to be shared soon 🌟 #oiw2024 #pioneers
